page.title: 02FARMING NEAR BROSELEY
page.content: { Mr. Davies}owns Manor Farm at Wyke where he{milks 64 cows,}he also rents Benthall Hall Farm, he grows{potatoes, {sugar beet, cereals. { Lord Forester}owns most of the other farms in this area some he farms himself he grows{oil seed rape, {cereals, potatoes and sheep. {Mr. P.M.Whiteman}rents Arlescott Farm he grows{potatoes and cereals}he also keeps{cattle and sheep.Mr.R.D.Whiteman rents Wyke Farm he grows{potatoes and {cereals}as well as keeping a{dairy {herd. Mr.Francis}rents Lodge Farm he grows{barley and beef. { Mr. Roberts}used to own Hilltop Farm but he sold it for{opencast {mining.}Now he farms what is left of it. { Mr.Weaver}farms Park Farm where he {milks.
